title: Bug 11280 [View Management] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the application, the view's maximized state is lost.
OB: The maximized state of a view is lost when switching perspectives.
EB: The view's maximized state should be maintained when switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application and maximize a view.
2. Switch to a different perspective.
3. Notice that the view is no longer maximized.
Expected:
- The view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
